description: Try our easy to follow Breakfast Bruschetta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bruschetta & crostini,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Quick & easy breakfast,Tomato,Low sugar,Avocado,Sesame free
name: Breakfast Bruschetta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat chargrill on medium-high heat. Cook short cut bacon rashers for 2-3 minutes each side until crisp.

Brush sourdough bread with a little olive oil and cook on a chargrill plate until golden (or toast if preferred). Keep both warm. Meanwhile, halve avocado and discard stone. Scoop out flesh with a large spoon.
Dice and season with salt and pepper. Slice 2 Roma tomatoes and arrange onto bread. Top with diced avocado and bacon.
